caller_intent: Junior wanted to finalize an insurance policy for a modular home after receiving a quote, had questions about the cost, and needed clarification on insurability and payment terms.
resolution_steps: Agent explained insurability and provided an example of liability coverage for property damage.
Discussed payment options (semi-annual vs. monthly/quarterly) and agreed on semi-annual payments.
Collected banking details for auto draft setup.
Confirmed policy initiation and document delivery via email (declarations page, receipt, electronic application).
knowledge_required: Premium calculation factors for mobile homes in suburban areas
Payment plan options and auto draft setup process
systems_referenced: Agency's email system for document delivery
summary: Junior finalized a modular home insurance policy after addressing cost concerns and clarifying coverage terms. The agent explained insurability, agreed to semi-annual payments, and set up auto draft with banking details. Documents will be emailed for electronic signing, with the first payment due June 21st.
